version_description:
- Help info added for those who can't run the app and give bad reviews :P
- Bug fixes

- volume slider added
- controll screen stays in place when app goes to background
- icon change
- overall improvements

- manually adding devices by host and port
- automatic host and port scanner based on network config
- storing the list of detected devices
- new menu design
- network info screen
- new help screen
- iOS 8 bug fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- iOS 11 bug fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- iOS 11 bug fixes

- Movie and TV show browser
- Media library search
- Covers, posters and plot of movies and TV shows
- The ability to change to media title and update library
- Kodi auto discovery in local network

- fix of connection lost when app was going into background
- volume slider added to remote screen
- some minor bug fixes
- Time bar for seeking through the movie fixed
